protein.general_function: Involved in ionotropic glutamate receptor activity
protein.specific_function: Receptor for glutamate. L-glutamate acts as an excitatory neurotransmitter at many synapses in the central nervous system. The postsynaptic actions of Glu are mediated by a variety of receptors that are named according to their selective agonists. This receptor binds domoate > kainate >> L-glutamate = quisqualate >> AMPA = NMDA

go_class.description: excitatory extracellular ligand-gated ion channel activity
